text: This unit's arrows spew clouds of deadly gas on impact.
Thunderous sounds and exploding flames agitate the enemy.
This unit can't shoot very far.
These soldiers obey only their own passions. They may charge without orders and act erratically on the battlefield!
This unit causes extra damage against shielded enemies.
This unit can fire on the move.
This unit's weapon allows it to pierce even the strongest enemy armour.
Their heavy metal bows are short-ranged but can pierce through enemies.
This unit fires whistling arrows that demoralise enemies along their trajectory.
These fanatics will blow themselves up when they're in a losing battle.
This unit's sticky rosin arrows cling to their targets, making them vulnerable to flames.
This unit can attack city gates, allowing you to instantly launch a siege battle without having to wait for towers or battering rams to be built.
This unit has a ranged weapon to light a fire from a distance.
